channel.title: I want to release my servers client but i cant make a zip folder D; HELP!
channel.description:
I have finished editing a Server and a Client I want to get my friends on the server but i cant zip the entire client folder What files/folders do i make a zip folder with
Please help guys

item.title: I want to release my servers client but i cant make a zip folder D; HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Move the cache into the client folder if it isn’t already.
Edit the findcachedir() method in signlink.java to point to the new location of the cache.
Right-click -> Send to… -> Compressed (zipped) folder

Read full topic
item.source: I want to release my servers client but i cant make a zip folder D; HELP!
